departments.title: Department of Arts and Design
departments.description: The Department of Arts and Design focuses on creative practices in visual arts, design, and technology.
departments.subtitle: Creative Innovation

departments.title: Department of Hotel, Catering & Institutional Management
departments.description: This department offers a comprehensive curriculum in hospitality, catering, and hotel management.
departments.subtitle: Hospitality Excellence

departments.title: Department of Information and Communication Technology
departments.description: The ICT department provides training in various ICT fields including networking and software engineering.
departments.subtitle: Technology for Tomorrow

departments.title: Department of Mechanical Engineering
departments.description: The Mechanical Engineering department specializes in automotive, production, and refrigeration technologies.
departments.subtitle: Engineering Innovation
